com.oo.campaignallocator.core

Class Campaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oo.campaignallocator.core.Campaign

  • public class Campaign
extends Object
    Campaign object that represents a campaign

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Campaign()
      Creates a campaign object
      Campaign(String customerName)
      Creates a campaign representation with customer name
      Campaign(String customerName, int impressions, int revenue)
      Creates a campaign representation with customer name, impressions, revenue
